title: Register Now – Webinar Title: Glacier Adaptation and financing
content:
Date: 3rd March 2026, Time: 9:00 am to 9:45 am CEST

Moderator : Shaily Gandhi

Speakers:

  • Anil Mishra
  • Dhiraj Pradhananga
  • Dr. Miriam Jackson
  • Dr. Bapon Fakhruddin

As we mark 2025 as the “Year of the Glacier,” the urgency to address the rapid retreat of these critical ice reserves has never been greater. Glaciers are essential for water security, ecosystems, and the livelihoods of millions, yet their accelerated decline due to climate change is already leading to severe impacts, including water scarcity and glacial lake outburs
creator: Asha
sourceDescription: Committee on Data of the ISC

title: Final Reminder: deadline approaching for poster submissions to DCM2026
content:
Final reminder to submit a poster for the Dataverse Community Meeting 2026, 12-15 May, World Trade Center, Barcelona. The deadline is February 16, 2026 (note that the deadline for presentations has passed): https://dcm2026.com/call-for-papers/

Posters could cover one of the conference themes, a dataset, collection, or Dataverse repository you want to showcase, or tools and projects that integrate with Dataverse.

Take advantage of the Early Bird registration fee, with the deadline approaching, February 28:
creator: Asha
sourceDescription: Committee on Data of the ISC
